database
Class SnowflakeHelper

java.lang.Object
  SQLiteOpenHelper
      database.SnowflakeHelper

public class SnowflakeHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

Helper class for creating and updating the snowflake database. This class is also a name manifest for all tables and columns. New subclasses require update of this class.

Author:
Jim Gunnarsson, di98jgu (edited by Viktor St√§rn)

onReset

public void onReset()
Manually reset table(s) to initial state. All data currently stored in the database will be lost.
